entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -38.6°C
Wind: NW 29 km/h gust 46 km/h

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
